languages.text: "Обо мне. О том, что я есть. Ты ведь видел{mf||а} сам{mf||а} — святой корабль отверг меня. Корабль, под своды которого дозволено войти лишь достойнейшим, меня таковой не посчитал". {n}В голосе Ардженты ни звучит ни нотки горечи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Обо мне. О том, что я есть. Ты ведь видел{mf||а} сам{mf||а} — святой корабль отверг меня. Корабль, под своды которого дозволено войти лишь достойнейшим, меня таковой не посчитал". {n}В голосе Ардженты ни звучит ни нотки горечи.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Обо мне. О том, что я есть. Ты ведь видел{mf||а} сам{mf||а} — святой корабль отверг меня. Корабль, под своды которого дозволено войти лишь достойнейшим, меня таковой не посчитал". {n}В голосе Ардженты ни звучит ни нотки горечи.{/n}

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "About myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我自身のことを言っているのです。我の人となりについてだ。陛下は全てを見た。神聖なる船が我を拒否するのを見た。その価値がある者だけが乗船できる船は、我を船に相応しい人物と見なさなかった」{n}アルジェンタの声に皮肉は感じられない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我自身のことを言っているのです。我の人となりについてだ。陛下は全てを見た。神聖なる船が我を拒否するのを見た。その価値がある者だけが乗船できる船は、我を船に相応しい人物と見なさなかった」{n}アルジェンタの声に皮肉は感じられない。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我指的是我自己，关于我究竟是什么样的人。当时发生的一切，你亲眼看在了眼里。只有最有资格的人才能踏上圣船，而那艘圣船认为我无权进入。”{n}阿洁塔的声音中没有任何苦涩之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我指的是我自己，关于我究竟是什么样的人。当时发生的一切，你亲眼看在了眼里。只有最有资格的人才能踏上圣船，而那艘圣船认为我无权进入。”{n}阿洁塔的声音中没有任何苦涩之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je parle de moi. De ce que je suis. Vous avez vu vous-même la façon dont le vaisseau sacré m'a rejetée. Ce lieu saint où seuls sont censés entrer les cœurs purs m'a jugée indigne d'un tel privilège. » {n}Vous ne décelez pas la moindre trace d'amertume dans la voix d'Argenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je parle de moi. De ce que je suis. Vous avez vu vous-même la façon dont le vaisseau sacré m'a rejetée. Ce lieu saint où seuls sont censés entrer les cœurs purs m'a jugée indigne d'un tel privilège. » {n}Vous ne décelez pas la moindre trace d'amertume dans la voix d'Argenta.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Me refiero a mí misma. A lo que soy. Lo vio todo. Vio cómo la nave sagrada me rechazaba. La nave en la que solo los más dignos pueden entrar no me consideró merecedora de tal derecho». {n}No hay amargura alguna en la voz de Argenta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me refiero a mí misma. A lo que soy. Lo vio todo. Vio cómo la nave sagrada me rechazaba. La nave en la que solo los más dignos pueden entrar no me consideró merecedora de tal derecho». {n}No hay amargura alguna en la voz de Argenta.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich spreche von mir selbst. Davon, was ich bin. Ihr habt alles gesehen, das heilige Schiff hat mich abgewiesen. Das Schiff, das nur die Würdigsten betreten dürfen, war der Ansicht, dass ich dieses Recht nicht verdiene." {n}Du hörst in Argentas Stimme keine Verbitterung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich spreche von mir selbst. Davon, was ich bin. Ihr habt alles gesehen, das heilige Schiff hat mich abgewiesen. Das Schiff, das nur die Würdigsten betreten dürfen, war der Ansicht, dass ich dieses Recht nicht verdiene." {n}Du hörst in Argentas Stimme keine Verbitterung.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kendimden bahsediyorum. Olduğum şeyden. Kendi gözlerinle gördün... Kutsal geminin beni nasıl reddettiğine tanık oldun. Yalnızca en layıkların girebildiği gemi, benim bu hakka müstahak olmadığıma karar verdi." {n}Argenta'nın sesinde en ufak bir sitem sezmiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm talking about myself. About what I am. You saw everything, you saw the sacred ship reject me. The ship that only the worthiest may enter did not deem me one who deserves that right." {n}You hear no bitterness in Argenta's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kendimden bahsediyorum. Ne olduğumdan. Kendi gözlerinle gördün... Kutsal geminin beni nasıl reddettiğine tanık oldun. Yalnızca en layık olanların girebildiği gemi, benim bu hakka layık olmadığıma karar verdi." {n}Argenta'nın sesinde herhangi bir sitem sezmiyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
